sub_title: B2B Senior Solution Architect at VodafoneZiggo
summary: Experienced Solutions Architect with a demonstrated history of working in the telecommunications industry. Skilled in Management, Business Intelligence, Solution Architecture, Telecommunications, and Unix. Strong operations professional graduated from University of Tirana, Albania.

education.degree_name: Integrated Second Level Bachelor Degree in Computer Sciences

profile_positions.description:
IT business analysts, architects and systems designer.  Responsible for the domain
delivery lifecycle for specific application products &components as part of the platform managed by the Application Delivery Lead incorporating low level product architecture, design, build & domain test; maintain strong understanding of the capabilities, strengths and weaknesses of specific domain applications; work closely with vendor product owners; manage and guide
the vendors delivering specific applications; manage factory vendors across the domain delivery lifecycle.
work hand in hand with technical architects for north to
south application delivery.
profile_positions.title: Billing Delivery Domain/ Billing and Payment Solution Architect

profile_positions.description:
•	Made decisions on sourcing options (in-house vs. external supplier), built requirements and evaluated and selected suppliers, prepared and reviewed supply contracts, and evaluated supplier performance.
•	Managed demand from various areas of company (business and technology departments) Made decision on sourcing options (make or buy) in alignment with Group Strategy.
•	Establish a clear BI architecture. 
•	Implement a demand management process by assigning SPOCS and prioritization rules
•	Establish quality of service KPIs and SLAs and controls to assure data quality
•	Collection of solution requirements,  technical solutions analyses and design, development coordinating, manage UAT and GO Live. Decision making regarding new applications and solutions.
Project I have been working:
•	SAS Visual Analytics Project, considered as an opportunity for VFAL in extending the usage of analytically based business decision making with the goal to identify and create new value from existing dataset, and optimize existing reporting and decision making processes.
profile_positions.title: Decision Support Services Manager  IT/DSS

profile_positions.description:
Made decisions on sourcing options (in-house vs. external supplier), built requirements and evaluated and selected suppliers, prepared and reviewed supply contracts, and evaluated supplier performance in IS areas, mostly  BRM, Mediation, Provisioning System

•	MeG Project, main key of the project of consolidation of legacy mediation platforms into Centralized Mediation System, hosted in VFItaly. Responsable for :
o	 Technical architectural Documentation of legacy mediation platforms in VFAL
o	 Data flow documentations of legacy mediation platforms 
o	Technical Input Interface documentation of legacy mediation platforms in VFAL
o	Technical output interface Documentation of legacy mediation platforms
profile_positions.title: Project Management Sn Officer / Business Support Services team

profile_positions.description:
•	BRM Project, support for transition phase of the project from legacy platforms and integration with legacy mediation platforms for further migration to consolidated one. Responsibilities included:
o	Technical project management, requirements definition and technical design for BRM rating pipeline including rating files’ structure and definitions, suspense rules, pipeline configuration, roaming tap in/out etc. for integration with different platforms, from network elements.
o	During operations was focused on various operations activities, BRM configurations for new products implementation, roaming partners’ configuration and interconnect/wholesale partner configurations.
o	Technical project management for the implementation of Interconnect and wholesale capabilities in BRM.
•	Technical Project Manager of Revenue Assurance Project (2013), solution based on WEDO Technologies Company for Usage Control and Platform Integrity modules. Design the architecture of integration of RAID with all VFAL network elements, built and translate the business logic of reconciliation process into terms of technical requirements and technical rules in core solution.  Evaluate and follow the business requirements with regards to introduction of new control points in RAID platform, as BAU. 
o	Related to BRM, the revenue assurance project included implementation of integrity validations of rated BRM events and of invoices, for which I was also responsible.
•	VFAL Technical Leader of Fraud Management System Project, based on HP solution, hosted in VF Italy, main technical architect and  support for integration of FMS with network elements (MSCs, SurepayIN) and rating solutions(BRM), CRM too for demographic data of VFAL subscribers.
•	Technical Project Manager for Legal Application Tool project, main technical architect and  support for integration of LEA with network elements and rating platforms(BRM), CRM too for demographic data of VFAL subscribers.
profile_positions.title: Technical Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Key Technical point for Project of Replacement of Legacy provisioning platform into two platforms, Resource Inventory Management System (Numeritrack) and Provisioning platform (Tertio), vendor Evolving. Technical architect for solutions based on provisioning systems and integration with other platforms(Mobile/Fixed Portability solution)
•	Key Technical point for integration of Oracle CRM (AIA middleware) with Provisioning Platforms and Resource Management system. 
•	Key technical point for architecture of integration of  BRM with Provisioning systems and Resource Management one
profile_positions.title: Provisioning Services Senior Officer / Business Support Services team

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Value Added Services Engineer / Technology
